title: I Can't Use the League of Legends Client Unless I Disconnect and Reconnect My WIFI
body: I usually end up dodging queues and Champion Select and getting penalized because I have to disconnect and reconnect. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: If you're needing to restart your wifi over and over, there might be something going wrong with that router possibly. Let's not jump to that quite yet though, instead we can go ahead and try a few troubleshooting steps really quickly to make sure everything is at least still properly configured. Check out this guide on [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and let me know if that's able to help!
